description:
Skillfully crafted with a durable and sustainable blend of recycled polyester and cotton canvas, it repels moisture with its PFC-free water-repellent finish. The contrasting lining and 250g insulation make it a great transitional jacket between seasons. The four flapped pockets and two handwarmer pockets offer ample storage. With a YKK® metal zipper, rib-knit collar, cuffs, and hem, it combines style with functionality.

Certified by GRS and Oeko-Tex® standard 100, it embodies our commitment to quality and sustainability. Elevate your wardrobe with the Bushplane Jacket, where durability, insulation, and practicality meet in one remarkable garment.
name: Hooke Bushplane Jacket - Mens
